name: Zen's Hook-Hardcore Platformer
description:
Climb to the top with your kunai and save your creators from evil samurai!

Zen's Hook is a hardcore singleplayer platformer for those who love challenging themselves in the hardest games ever.

Hook to walls with your kunai to evade enemy attacks and save scientist kidnapped by their own machines!Memorize the location of your enemies and focus on dodging them! Get ready for new challenges and don't let your creators get hurt!

Play campaign mode to gain new abilities and make your way easier!

Enjoy playing classic mode,and relaxing in zen!
